organizationId.description: If defined, access is limited to specified organization(s)

siteId.description: If defined, access is limited to specified site(s)

ip.description: If defined, access is limited to specified list of IPs (1.2.3.4) and/or netmasks (1.2.3.4/24, 1.2.3.4/255.255.255.0)

closed.description: If true chat will be disabled

preModeration.description: If true messages needs to be approved before show in chat

userUrls.description: If true allows to users submit urls in chat

privilegeRequests.description: If true allows users to request to be moderator

profanityFilter.description:
Define the filter applied to messages 

* block: block all 
* none: no filter applied 
* replace: replace the message 
* false: disable the filter 
* true: enable the filter 
* blocked: block all

moderatorVisibility.description:
Show the who are the moderators to users 

* ALL: show moderators in chat and channels 
* CHANNEL: show moderators only in channels 
* FLAGGED: do not show who are the moderators

anonymousPosts.description: If true enable anonymous users to post

directMessages.description:
Change behavior to send direct messages for other users. 

* all: all users can send messages to others users 
* moderators: only moderators can send messages to others users

chatColor.description: Change the chat color, using hexadecimal color
